ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, it s pretty funny when I think back on it. I wonder how embarassed that GM was later after they said never . I have a loooong list of things I d like to
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, it's pretty funny when I think back on it. I wonder how embarassed
that GM was later after they said "never".
I have a loooong list of things I'd like to see in game if anyone is
interested in me posting it.
luv,
-Su
